cells.data:
In the compositor, added a Glare node to add flares to the overhead lamp. Set Mix to negative number to decrease the effect to only the lamp and to keep the effect from being too large. Set streaks to 8 for 8 streaks:


Want to add a glow effect throughout the image. First use a Math node set to Greater Than to isolate the brightest parts of the image:


The image is black in white. We now mix the Greater Than output with a Mix node with the Image output to color the isolated sections:



Next, run the output through a Blur node with the settings noted:



Finally, using a Mix node set to Add to combine the blurred elements with the original render. Factor set to 0.5 in this instance:



Full render to this point:


Now, to add a vignette to the scene. Add a Lens Distortion node set Distort to 1, connect that to a Blur node and Use a Mix node set to Multiply with the original image. Turn down the Factor input until you have the result you like:



Final render to this point:



Finally, added a ToneMap node to lighten the entire image overall. Connected the original image to the ToneMap and then mixed it will the original image through a Mix node set to Overlay.



Final Image:


Then the absolute last thing is a color balance node to shift the overall colors slightly:
